TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EndpointAddressAugust2004 extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Docs.summary: Provides a serializable type of endpoint address that is compliant with the version of WS-Addressing published in August 2004 and that enables it to be exposed as part of the service contract.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not serializable nor is it tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification. [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] supplies a class that provides a serializable type, <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10>, which is WS-Addressing V1 compliant.
This class provides a WS-Addressing August 2004 compliant wrapper for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that is serializable and bound to a particular wire format for legacy purposes. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29> method does the wrapping and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.ToEndpointAddress%2A> method does the unwrapping, allowing the recovery of the endpoint address after being serialized on the wire.
## Examples [!code-cs[EndpointAddressAugust2004#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.en_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[EndpointAddressAugust2004#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.en_0_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004 FromEndpointAddress(class System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress address) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> used to initialize the instance of this class.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified endpoint address.
Docs.returns: The class that contains the specified endpoint address.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification or bound to a particular wire format.
## Examples [!code-cs[EndpointAddressAugust2004#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/7b8e18c3-c041-4c7d-bb46-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[EndpointAddressAugust2004#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/7b8e18c3-c041-4c7d-bb46-_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName GetSchema(class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet xmlSchemaSet) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> that contains a cache of the XML schema definition language (XSD) schemas for the endpoint address.
Docs.summary: Returns an XML-qualified name that describes the XML representation of the version 1 endpoint address from a specified cached schema.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that describes the XML representation of the endpoint address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is required by the serialization contract. It must be public to be seen by the XmlSerializer. It is not intended to be called by developers.
